divs: Sighting Detailsi have a few stories to tell mufon from 1975 to 1977 i have 3 witnesses that saw the same thing i saw. it happen coming back from the beaches in delaware an two from when i ran the rode with my oldest brother mike. he is the one that showed me this object the first time i saw it. will have to explain the first time i seen it. and also about 7 bright orange balls in the sky out west.
Summary: like a star then light came out of light we were watching moved to the side then both took off out of sight
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Milford
There were no other sightings in Milford on or around May 31st 1977
